Letâ€™s see how to cook your chosen dish.

Ingredients

Here is what you need to have at home.

Ingredient Quantity Unit
mushroom 600 g
cooking onion 1 piece
lard or olive oil 1 tbsp
sour cream 150 ml
pasta (small shells) 250 g
seasoning: -paprika -salt -pepper -garlic powder and -Vegeta to your taste -

Serves: Make sure to share, and buy for your pals.

Preparation

Here are the steps to cook the meal. Takes as long as it takes. Share and enjoy!

  1. Play music in the kitchen. I recommend this playlist.
  2. Pore a glass of drink for the chef.
  3. Add the lard to a sauce pan, and fry the finely chopped onions.
  4. Add paprika to the onions, then add the chopped mushrooms.
  5. Stir until it goes soft, then add vegeta mix and seasoning. Meantime, boil pasta.
  6. Add little water if necessary, then the sour cream. Grate garlic onto the stew to finish it off.
  7. Serve on pasta and enjoy.
